sys_script.name: Domain - Set Domain - NeedIt Task

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Domain - Set Domain - NeedIt Task</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[syncDomainFromNeedIt();
	
	function syncDomainFromNeedIt() {
	
		// Set the Domain for the NeedIt Task from the Domain of the parent NeedIt record.	
		if (current.u_needit.changes()) {
			current.sys_domain = current.u_needit.sys_domain;
			return;
		}
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-03 18:54:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6a4c965d1b031010ea9e40c6cc4bcb2e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Domain - Set Domain - NeedIt Task</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6a4c965d1b031010ea9e40c6cc4bcb2e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-03 18:54:26</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6a4c965d1b031010ea9e40c6cc4bcb2e"/></record_update>
